articles.author: Myles McCormick, Patrick Temple-West
articles.title: US judge ends Exxon lawsuit against shareholder over climate activism - Financial Times
articles.description: A divisive case over climate change and shareholder rights winds down after shareholder agrees to drop effort
articles.content:
A US judge has dismissed ExxonMobils lawsuit against an activist shareholder who challenged the oil majors climate change risks, capping a stand-off with environmentalists and giant pension funds.

articles.author: Jakob Hanke Vela, Jordyn Dahl
articles.title: Europe gives China a taste of its own trade medicine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Europe is using the threat of tariffs to press Chinese electric car makers to set up in the EU and share know-how.
articles.content: The big idea is to use the tariff threat to force Chinese carmakers to come to Europe to form joint ventures and share technology with their EU counterparts, according to conversations with four dipl… [+1478 chars]
